RobotControllerManager.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 from controller_manager_msgs.srv import SwitchController, ListControllers
3 import rospy
4 from enum import Enum
5 
6 
7 class ControllerType(Enum):
8  POSITION = 1
9  VELOCITY = 2
10  TRAJECTORY = 3
11 
12 
13 class RobotControllerManager():
14  def __init__(self, controller_names=None):
15  """
16  Creates the RobotControllerManager object and
17  determines the correct mode to be in - position,
18  velocity, or trajectory.
19  When the controller names are not provided, they default to the franka
20  panda (which is the standard robot used in the repo - and pretty good, too)
21 
22  structure of controller_names:
23 
24  `controller_names[0]` - position controller names - `List[str]`
25 
26  `controller_names[1]` - velocity controller names - `List[str]`
27 
28  `controller_names[2]` - trajectory controller name* - `List[str]`
29 
30  """
31  self.switch_controller_service_name = "/controller_manager/switch_controller"
32  self.list_controller_service_name = "/controller_manager/list_controllers"
33  if controller_names is None:
34  position_controller_names = ["panda_joint{}_position_controller".format(i) for i in range(1, 8)]
35  velocity_controller_names = ["panda_joint{}_velocity_controller".format(i) for i in range(1, 8)]
36  trajectory_controller_names = ["panda_joint_trajectory_controller"]
37  else:
38  position_controller_names = controller_names[0]
39  velocity_controller_names = controller_names[1]
40  trajectory_controller_names = controller_names[2]
41 
42  self.controller_names = {
43 
44  ControllerType.POSITION: position_controller_names,
45  ControllerType.VELOCITY: velocity_controller_names,
46  ControllerType.TRAJECTORY: trajectory_controller_names
47 
48  }
49  try:
50  rospy.wait_for_service(self.list_controller_service_name)
51  list_controllers = rospy.ServiceProxy(self.list_controller_service_name, ListControllers)
52  controller_list = list_controllers().controller
53  print(controller_list)
54  self.mode = ControllerType.TRAJECTORY
55 
56  for controller in controller_list:
57  if controller.state == "running":
58  if controller.name in position_controller_names:
59  self.mode = ControllerType.POSITION
60  elif controller.name in velocity_controller_names:
61  self.mode = ControllerType.VELOCITY
62  elif controller.name in trajectory_controller_names:
63  self.mode = ControllerType.TRAJECTORY
64 
65  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
66  rospy.logerr("Controller Manager service exception:", e)
67 
68  def switch_mode(self, desired_mode):
69  """
70  Based on mode type desired by user, switch controllers from current one.
71 
72  Desired mode should be a ControllerType enum
73  """
74  # check if mode is running
75  if desired_mode == self.mode:
76  pass
77  else:
78  try:
79  while 1:
80  rospy.wait_for_service(self.switch_controller_service_name)
81  switch_controller = rospy.ServiceProxy(self.switch_controller_service_name, SwitchController)
82  # switch the controllers
83  resp = switch_controller(self.controller_names[desired_mode],
84  self.controller_names[self.mode], 1, True, 10)
85  # Break from while loop is response is Okay meaning the switching was successful
86  if resp.ok:
87  break
88 
89  self.mode = desired_mode
90  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
91  rospy.logerr("Controller Manager service exception:", e)
